values.value: Documented inspections are required by a competent person (trained to 1926.451, capable of identifying hazards and has authorization to take prompt corrective actions) prior to each shift or after any event that could affect structural integrity. A competent person is required to be present for the erection and dismantling of scaffold systems and to determine the safety during high wind or storm events. CFR 1926.451 (f)(3)
If a scaffold system is in use, has it been inspected and being used under the supervision of a competent person?
